response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your business or lifestyle, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its market value but also my commitment to fostering long-term relationships with our esteemed clients. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 10500}
